scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd - && cd server/ && npm i
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && cd client/ && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && cd ../server/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd -
